title: LG officially unveils the V10 with a second screen and dual front-facing cameras
text:
LG officially unveils the V10 with a second screen and dual front-facing cameras 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
We've seen leaks upon leaks leading up to its release, but the new LG V10 is now official. LG has officially announced the new smartphone, w...
